title: Application of lentil seed extract as an inhibitor to assess the corrosion properties of copper–nickel alloys in a NaCl environment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28044-28057
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04758C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mona M. Nageeb, Ghalia A. Gaber, Amal S. I. Ahmed, Abd El Aziz S. Fouda
Weight loss (WL), was used to explore the efficiency of lentil seed extract (LSE) in mitigating the corrosion of Cu–10Ni and Cu–30Ni alloys in obviously aerated water.
